title: RXR — TaskBank
subtitle: Internal task and workflow management platform designed to organize, track, and automate departmental processes across the organization.
description: TaskBank is an internal platform created to centralize the management of tasks and workflows between different departments. The system replaced dispersed processes and allowed to define tasks with statuses, recurrences, files and automatic reminders. My main responsibility was to design and implement the complete frontend, working together with backend to define flows, statuses and system behavior.

challenges.description: Implement multiple interaction modes (create, read, edit and clone tasks) within the same flow without compromising usability.
Manage complex states and internal dependencies in an interface with high functional density.
Integrate recurrences, file uploads, notes and email notifications in a coherent and maintainable system.

achievements.description: Delivery of a functional platform used by more than 100 internal active users.
Consolidation of workflows and recurring tasks into a single centralized system.
Implementation of a robust UI capable of supporting complex operations without degrading the user experience.

gallery.alt: RXR Open task - drag and drop - clone task
RXR Open task - history and recurrences

title: MobiliHD — Case Management Platform
subtitle: Internal case and task management system built for a real estate company to track operations, workflows, and case lifecycle efficiently.
description: MobiliHD is an internal platform designed to manage cases and operational tasks within a real estate company. The system centralizes case tracking, status changes, and team workflows, replacing manual processes with a visual and data-driven interface. I was responsible for building the frontend MVP and later leading a full redesign and refactor to improve usability, maintainability, and development speed.

challenges.description: Designing a scalable case management UI that could handle large datasets while maintaining performance.
Keeping UI state consistent while synchronizing paginated data and real-time status updates with the backend.
Refactoring a production system without disrupting daily operations or existing user workflows.

achievements.description: Delivered a production-ready MVP used internally by a real estate team of fewer than 100 users.
Improved frontend maintainability and iteration speed through a structured refactor and clearer state management.
Reduced development time significantly in the second version by leveraging AI-assisted workflows during refactoring.

title: Customela — Contract Automation Platform
subtitle: Web-based contract automation platform that allows users to create, manage, and version dynamic legal documents through a WYSIWYG editor.
description: Customela is a SaaS platform focused on automating contract creation using dynamic templates. Users can define variables, clauses, and structured objects inside a WYSIWYG editor, enabling reusable and versioned contract models. I was responsible for designing and implementing the frontend architecture and integrating complex editor logic with backend systems.

challenges.description: Integrating a WYSIWYG editor with a dynamic data model for variables, clauses, and nested objects.
Supporting versioned contract templates while maintaining backward compatibility.
Ensuring predictable editor behavior when inserting, updating, or removing dynamic placeholders.

achievements.description: Built the foundational frontend architecture, including layouts, base components, and theming (light/dark).
Implemented reliable mechanisms for reading, writing, and updating dynamic contract variables.
Enabled versioned contract models without breaking existing documents or user workflows.

gallery.alt: First view of Customela - landing page

title: JDI — Sales Performance & KPI Platform
subtitle: Internal platform for tracking sales performance, KPIs, and competitions across multiple automotive branches and dealer groups.
description: JDI is a business intelligence platform used by automotive dealerships to monitor sales KPIs, advisors’ performance, and branch-level metrics. The system supports multiple branches, grouped entities, and competitive rankings between teams. I worked primarily on the frontend, building complex dashboards and multi-step workflows inside a Laravel monolith.

challenges.description: Managing complex, interdependent state across multi-step creation flows.
Preventing unnecessary re-renders in highly dynamic dashboards.
Maintaining frontend scalability while integrating React into a legacy Blade-based monolith.

achievements.description: Built interactive KPI dashboards used by approximately 229 active users.
Designed multi-step flows for creating and managing groups and competitions with clear logical dependencies.
Reduced rendering overhead by isolating state into atomic units, improving performance and maintainability.
